entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:07 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:07 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:07 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
